word[0]: I wouldn’t put it past somebody (to do something)
definition[0]: used to say that you would not be surprised if someone did something bad or unusual because it is typical of them to do that type of thing
example[0]: I wouldn’t put it past Colin to cheat.
definition[1]: used to say that you think someone could easily do something wrong or illegal
example[1]: I wouldn’t put it past him to use force.
